items.title: Hotel Mansingh Palace
items.summary: A comfortable, modern hotel in an interesting area of Agra, with plenty of shops and restaurants nearby.

items.title: Hotel Taj Resorts
items.summary: Located close to the Taj Mahal, this modern hotel has simple but clean and well-maintained rooms.

items.title: The Coral House Homestay
items.summary: Pratibha & Sanjay have opened their delightful home to guests. There are 6 charming, colourfully-decorated rooms, and lovely shaded courtyards in which to relax and chat with the family and other guests.

items.title: The Coral Tree Homestay
items.summary: This six-room home-stay is just a short walk away from the entrance to the Taj Mahal.

items.title: The Grand Imperial
items.summary: This 100-year-old building is testimony to India’s long and varied history. The low, white colonial building dating back to the Raj era is peppered with Mughal paintings and memorabilia, and was host at one time to the Crown Princes of England as well as to Mohammad Ali Jinnah.

items.title: The Oberoi Amarvilas
items.summary: One of India’s most exclusive hotels, the Oberoi Amarvilas is the only hotel in Agra to offer unobstructed views of the Taj Mahal, merely 600 metres away.

items.title: Trident Agra
items.summary: An attractive superior hotel in Agra. This elegant low-rise building is situated in six acres of beautiful gardens.
